meanings.definition: A device for measuring and indicating time, typically in hours and minutes.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother's antique timepieces are displayed in a glass cabinet.
meanings.sent2: I always wear a timepiece on my wrist to keep track of appointments.
meanings.sent3: The timepieces in the museum seemed to be having a silent conversation with each other.
meanings.sent4: The timepieces in the room ticked in perfect harmony, creating a soothing melody.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the timepieces made them look like miniature works of art.

meanings.definition: An object that shows the current time, such as a watch or clock.
meanings.sent1: The train station had several large digital timepieces for passengers to check.
meanings.sent2: She received a beautiful timepiece as a graduation gift from her parents.
meanings.sent3: The timepieces on the wall all seemed to be in a race to see who could tick the loudest.
meanings.sent4: His collection of timepieces was so vast that he needed a separate room to display them all.
meanings.sent5: The timepieces in the shop window gleamed under the bright lights, catching the eye of every passerby.
